author: geonmo
body:
### Porting GEM Detector validation module from 62X_SLHC release.
#### Features
- Simulation collection : Support simhit occupancy and efficiency plots.
- Digitization collection : Support Strip and pad plots' occupancy and efficiency plots.
- L1 Collection : Support copad's occupancy and efficiency plots
- Reco Collection : Support Reco hits occupancy plots
#### Additional information :
- #8890 is required for this PR to support Copad digi collection. ( #8890 already is included this PR.)
- SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration is fixed to change schedule and configuration to run validation modules.
title: Validation module about GEM Detector at High Eta region.
